= bag( arg1, ..., argN ) =

Checks if any of the supplied arguments match the bag number an item is in.


== Arguments ==

  * arg1...N = bag number

== Remarks ==
  * bag numbers are not the blizzard code, they are just the position the bag is in, ie from 1 to x (where is is the total number of bags for that location)

== Examples ==

`bag( 1 )`

`bag( 1, 2, 7 )`
